document.document_content: Docker is commonly used for containerization, but in this course, we recommend using Podman instead. Podman is rootless, daemonless, and compatible with Docker commands.
You must use `gpt-3.5-turbo-0125`, even if the AI Proxy only supports `gpt-4o-mini`. Use the OpenAI API directly for this question.
If you score 10/10 and get a bonus, your dashboard will show 110 as the score.
